creator: roland@javalia.se
text:
Hi!

Sometimes when logging it would be very usefull to be able to copy the contents of the log-entry. Right now when writing this enhancement-report I'd looking at SQL-statments to try to debug an error. I'd really liked to being able to copy the statement from the log-entry to a sql-editor.

Thanks in advance
Roland
You can copy text of an event from the detail panel.
creator: sdeboy@iname.com
carnold@apache.org
text: Marking as WORKSFORME since Scott suggested a method of accomplishing the task and there was no feedback.
